WRITING.TEXT: Sorry, I meant my base nicotine is 80% PG, 20% VG My target juice is normally 70% PG, 30% VG. Too much PG?
Can I speed this up with a rice bath, bowl of hot water?
Thanks for this, I will definitely mix this up!
I think a week is probably the longest I've steeped for. I guess I should resist the urge to sneak some before then. So tempting though.
Thanks for the suggestion, I'll check it out!

WRITING.TITLE: New at DIY and feeling discouraged
WRITING.TEXT:
Hi, I was hoping to get a little advice from some of you more experienced DIY'ers. I've only just started to get into it and have "tried" to mix up a few different flavours. I love strong, sweet juices and have a preference for creamy/custard type stuff. I've tried various percentages and just can't seem to hit the right note, it never tastes sweet enough and almost always just too weak.
For instance, I have tried Vanilla Custard recipes a few times using from 4% to 14%,adding EM, not adding EM and using 80% PG. I just cant figure out what I should be doing. Is there a sweet spot I just haven't hit?
Here is my list of flavours. This is the first batch Ive bought so it's not alot but, could anyone recommend me a recipe that I could try with these particular flavours?
Vanilla Bean Ice Cream Vanilla Custard V1 French Vanilla Golden Pineapple Sweet Strawberry Choc Fudge Brownie EM Koolada
I would really appreciate some advice!

My cousin came to visit on holiday. My dad and I took him prawning we lived in Nth Qld, Australia, he lived in Sydney. After catching a bunch of prawns in the net, he looked confused and asked "Where do you get the orange prawns?"

Who gives a fuck what other people think or say. Vape away. I've been vaping for 4 years, I don't vape anywhere where smoking is not allowed. Tbh I've never had anyone say anything negative, people seem to be more curious about it than anything.
Yes, he no longer smokes cigarettes. He vapes.

I agree with you man, if that means anything. I was a teen when he died. I was 13 when Teen Spirit broke and am still a fan, always will be. Too many fucking scumbag, tryhards on reddit think making jokes about the death is funny, or makes them look controversial. Fucking sheep.

He was a great conservationist and educator. Passionate about saving endangered animals, spent shitloads on buying land to prevent land clearing of natural habitats. Sure he was a little ecentric, but so fuckin what? He was excited and passionate about his work. He was a top bloke in my book and well missed.

Didn't you read the article? It's very possible the stingray confused his shadow with a tiger shark and felt threatened, therefore lashed out. If you knew anything about Steve Irwin you'd know he did enormous amounts of good for wildlife.

Dear Zachary
Yeah I saw this awhile ago, really moving and very very sad.
Australia

That's a guy?

Bullshit, there is always somewhere you could bury him, take a drive and find a nice peaceful secluded spot somewhere. Any pet deserves at least a burial instead of being thrown in a fucking box and dumped in your driveway.
Thanks! With shadows just work from dark to light, lots of blending I use either a tortillion or tissue paper.
